spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but window and door placements show minor deviations from the plan, specifically in the rear bathrooms and the transition to the side balcony.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is consistent and overall topology is correct. Adjacency is preserved across all major rooms.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan effectively (dining table, sofas, beds). Minor scale inconsistencies with the kitchen island and bedroom side tables.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting is soft and professional. Geometry is clean with no visible artifacts or clipping.

detected_errors.description: Small window in the top-middle bathroom is slightly offset compared to the 2D blueprint.
Swing direction for the master bedroom door appears inverted compared to the indicated plan arc.
The kitchen island/peninsula appears slightly elongated compared to the proportion shown in the 2D layout.
